summary: Implement calendar-mapped, steadily increasing monthly fitness targets (push-ups, squats, plank) based on the existing steady-climb plan, replacing the current Monthly Targets.
architectural_notes: Monthly targets should be generated/mapped by calendar month (Jan–Dec), not user-relative months; replace existing Monthly Targets values with the steady-climb plan progression.

existing_features.title: Update the Monthly Targets panel to use the 'Steady Climb' year plan values (from uploaded image IMG_3316-1.jpeg) as the monthly targets for Push-ups/Press-ups, Squats, and Plank, replacing the current Monthly Targets behavior shown in IMG_3328.jpeg.

Map the Steady Climb plan months to calendar months (January = Month 1, February = Month 2, …, December = Month 12) when rendering targets for the currently selected month in the dashboard month tabs.

Keep showing the user's completed monthly totals derived from habit records, but present them separately from the plan target (e.g., show both 'Total' and 'Target' for each applicable habit within the Monthly Targets panel).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update Monthly Targets to follow the steady-climb plan (image 3316) with incremental increases for each calendar month, replacing current targets (image 3328).

projectName: Replace Monthly Targets with calendar-mapped 'Steady Climb' plan (push-ups, squats, plank)
